Hi all,
I'm working on a form in **Xperience by Kentico**, and I have a few customization needs. I'd appreciate your guidance on the following:
1. Is there a way to modify the form's style directly within Xperience by Kentico? 2. How can I apply specific validation to a single field? Is there a way to inject custom JavaScript for this? 3. If I want to apply CSS to the entire form or just a single field, how can I achieve this? 4. Lastly, if I want to customize the appearance of validation messages, where and how can I modify their CSS?
Thanks in advance for any help!
